meanings.definition: Divided into four parts or sections.
meanings.sent1: The quadripartite cake was cut into equal pieces for everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: The quadripartite puzzle had four distinct sections that needed to be solved separately.
meanings.sent3: The quadripartite room divider made it look like there were four rooms in one!
meanings.sent4: Her quadripartite approach to problem-solving involved breaking down the task into four manageable parts.
meanings.sent5: The quadripartite flag symbolized unity among four different groups.

meanings.definition: Consisting of four parts or elements.
meanings.sent1: The quadripartite necklace had four different gemstones set in a row.
meanings.sent2: The quadripartite team consisted of four members, each with a specific role.
meanings.sent3: The quadripartite flower arrangement showcased four different types of blooms.
meanings.sent4: His quadripartite plan for the project involved delegating tasks to four different departments.
meanings.sent5: The quadripartite structure of the building allowed for separate entrances for each department.
